page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN HAMBLEDON
page.content: Hartridges Soft Drinks,founded in 1884 by the present chairman's great grandfather,is the largest employer in {Hambledon.}The site has a supply of spring water for its products.It is an expanding firm,producing 250,000 bottles of pop a week.It remains a family business and the chairman's sons are salesmen.The firm employs 40 people,14 of whom live in Hambledon. The firm supports village events and supplies the cricket teams kit. {Self-employed workers in Hambledon include the following:a picture framer,a potter,a land agent,an electrician,a builder and a boiler engineer.{Shopkeepers and publicans report a steady trade,the latter limited only by the size of their premises.Most of the self-employed businesses are expanding.There is a very low level of{unemployment.
